meanings.definition: The study of the microscopic structure of tissues and organs.
meanings.sent1: Microanatomy involves examining tiny details in tissues and organs.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use microanatomy to understand how cells are arranged in the body.
meanings.sent3: Studying microanatomy is like solving a puzzle with very small pieces.
meanings.sent4: The beauty of microanatomy lies in the intricate patterns hidden from the naked eye.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, microanatomy reveals a world of complexity within our bodies.

meanings.definition: The microscopic anatomy of living organisms.
meanings.sent1: In biology class, we learned about the microanatomy of different animals.
meanings.sent2: Microanatomy helps us understand how tiny structures function in living beings.
meanings.sent3: Exploring the microanatomy of insects can be surprisingly fascinating.
meanings.sent4: The secrets of life are often found in the details of microanatomy.
meanings.sent5: Through microanatomy, we appreciate the intricate design of nature at a tiny scale.
